title: Airlift could be the Achilles' heel in the US Air Force plan for surviving a fight with China
description: The Air Force has a concept for keeping its aircraft survivable in a war with China. The service's airlift problem could hinder that plan.

title: Confused Trump, 79, Instantly Forgets He Just Refused to Comment
description: President Donald Trump declined to answer a question from a reporter—only to instantly forget and then confirm exactly what she’d just asked him. During the flight back to D.C. from his Mar-a-Lago holiday stay on Sunday, a reporter asked Trump aboard Air Force One: “The New York Times reported you spoke with Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro. Did you?

title: Nike's Cyber Monday sale is live: Save up to 75% on select sneakers and workout gear with its stackable promo deal
description: This Cyber Monday, you can save on Nike's Air Max, Dunk, and Air Force sneakers. Get up to 50% off select styles, plus an extra 25% applicable items.

title: North Korea's Kim stresses Air Force's nuclear war deterrence on its 80th anniversary
The US Air Force just war-gamed how pilots would fight if they lost communications in a high-intensity future war
description: In a future war, pilots may have to continue missions without consistent communications from commanders, forcing them to adapt.
